PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_RailwaySignalType
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties common to the definition of occurrences and types of IfcSignal applied in railways.

PropertyDef.Name: SignalIndicatorType
PropertyDef.Definition: Type of the indicators on a signal, e.g. route indicator, speed restriction indicator etc.

PropertyDef.Name: LensDiffuserType
PropertyDef.Definition: Type of the lens diffuser the signal is equipped with.

PropertyDef.Name: HasConductorRailGuardBoard
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates if a guard board is provided.

PropertyDef.Name: MaximumDisplayDistance
PropertyDef.Definition: The maximum distance that can be displayed. The value relates only to the signal type, not to the circumstances at a special position.

PropertyDef.Name: RequiredDisplayDistance
PropertyDef.Definition: The required distance that has to be displayed. The value relates only to the signal type, not to the circumstances at a special position.

PropertyDef.Name: IsHighType
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates if the signal is high (TRUE) or dwarf (ground mounted) (FALSE).

PropertyDef.Name: SignalHoodLength
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal length of the signal hood, which is the signal lamp cover against glaring sun.

PropertyDef.Name: HotStripOrientation
PropertyDef.Definition: Position of the hot strip, which indicates the direction of the focus of the light beam and is given in terms like "left upper quadrant (LUQ)" or "5 o'clock".

PropertyDef.Name: LensDiffuserOrientation
PropertyDef.Definition: Orientation the lens diffuser has to have, which indicates the direction of the lens diffuser and is given in terms like "left upper quadrant (LUQ)" or "5 o'clock".

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfLamps
PropertyDef.Definition: Number of lamps the signal is composed of.

PropertyDef.Name: SignalMessage
PropertyDef.Definition: All possible message available at this signal, e.g. "3/4- display automatic blocking".

PropertyDef.Name: RailwaySignalType
PropertyDef.Definition: The type of railway signal, e.g. home signal, starting signal, shunting signal, level crossing signal.
